import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Sidebar from '../admin/Sidebar'; import { FaEye, FaEyeSlash, FaEdit, FaTrashAlt, FaBars, FaSearch, FaBell, FaEnvelope } from 'react-icons/fa'; import '../../css/ProductTable.css'; const ProductTable = () => { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const products = [ { id: 1, image: '/images/product1.jpg', name: 'Xịt vệ sinh Răng Miệng Chó Mèo', price: 289000, discountPrice: 289000, quantity: 30, date: '31/05/2005', status: true, }, { id: 2, image: '/images/product2.jpg', name: 'Khăn ướt vệ sinh Đa Năng', price: 289000, discountPrice: 289000, quantity: 30, date: '31/05/2005', status: false, }, { id: 3, image: '/images/product1.jpg', name: 'Xịt vệ sinh Răng Miệng Chó Mèo', price: 289000, discountPrice: 289000, quantity: 30, date: '31/05/2005', status: true, }, { id: 4, image: '/images/product1.jpg', name: 'Xịt vệ sinh Răng Miệng Chó Mèo', price: 289000, discountPrice: 289000, quantity: 30, date: '31/05/2005', status: true, }, { id: 5, image: '/images/product1.jpg', name: 'Xịt vệ sinh Răng Miệng Chó Mèo', price: 289000, discountPrice: 289000, quantity: 30, date: '31/05/2005', status: true, }, ]; const filteredProducts = products.filter((product) => product.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) ); return (
{/* --- GLOBAL HEADER --- */}
